update BLOG
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_FLAG = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_VIA = #{createdVia,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update BLOG set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_FLAG = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_VIA = #{createdVia,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
